replies.body:
Aweh Corey :( It's really sad to see you go. I remember the first time I met you, we didn't start off on a good path. But when you came back, I could see the improvement. And you've grown to be an amazing, friendly, and mature player. Thank you for that. I will miss seeing you in game, and I hope one day we'll meet again.

Till then,
Best of luck. - Frosted
replies.body_tagged:
Aweh Corey :( It's really sad to see you go. I remember the first time I met you, we didn't start off on a good path. But when you came back, I could see the improvement. And you've grown to be an amazing, friendly, and mature player. Thank you for that. I will miss seeing you in game, and I hope one day we'll meet again.

Till then,
Best of luck. - Frosted
